text:
Untuk sahabat yg berkunjung ke Jakarta, POP hotel bisa jadi pilihan untuk menginap. Salah satu hotel di Jakarta Pusat yang memiliki akses yang mudah ke pusat belanja, kuliner serta memberikan kenyamanan dalam menikmati malam anda di kamar hotel yg bersih dan pelayanan yang ramah dan berkualitas. Anda bisa  senja anda dengan segelas kopi hitam di Selasar dekat lobi sambil melihat hilir mudik kendaraan di jalur utama. 
Pengalaman berkunjung kali ini memang berbeda dari biasanya Krn masih di situasi Pandemi Covid- 1 gy9. Namun setelah penerapan New Normal aktivitas hotel ini mulai ramai dengan terus menerapkan protokol kesehatan. Dari pintu masuk hotel sampai masuk ke kamar selalu tersedia Hand Sanitizer. Di Lobi hotelpun sdh diatur jaga jarak dan semua pengunjung selalu menggunakan masker. Ini perlu dijaga untuk menjadi budaya semua hotel umumnya untuk mencegah penularan C-19. Kunjungan sy ke Jakarta memang bukan yang pertama. Sebelumnya pernah ke Jakarta dan menginap di Hotel lain. Pengalaman menginap di POP hotel adalah pengalaman pertama. Namun ada yg berda dan berkesan buat saya. Sepertinya sy tidak akan ke lain"hati" untuk kunjungan berikutnya.. hehe..jadi Romantis..
Tapi ini memang benar adanya. Sy sedang menikmatinya dan itu menjadi apresiasi saya terhadap manajemen. Semoga ini tetap dipertahankan dan bisa ditingkatkan di waktu yang akan datang sehingga customer tidak akan berpaling. Harus disadari bahwa persaingan bisnis perhotelan memang luar biasa, apalagi kelas Ibu Kota..
Tentu POP hotel tidak akan mau kalah saingan dan akhirnya ditinggalkan Customer. Sebagai salah satu Customer baru, saya merasa jadi bagian dari POP dan menjadi agen promosi untuk sahabat dan kenalan yang lainnya.

Tetap semangat POP Hotel

Jadilah yang terdepan dalam memberikan kualitas pelayanan terbaik..

Tetap semangat menerapkan NEW Normal.

Sukses besar menanti anda!!!

Ayo !! Ke POP

Terimakasih Pop Hotel

text:
Pemikiran saya tentang hotel low budget dengan fasilitas seadanya sudah tersingkirkan sejak menginap di Pop Hotel  Pasar Baru. Pengalaman menginap tiga hari di hotel ini mengesankan.

Mulai dari checkin hingga checkout.

Proses Check-in : 

Lumayan cepat. Tak sampai 5 menit, mas Dayat selaku receptionist begitu cekatan membantu saya dalam proses cek-in dan menginformasikan yang ada di sekitar pasar baru

Lokasi Hotel :

Lokasinya sangat strategis. Dari stasiun Juanda sekitar 10 menitan berkendara dan juga dekat dengan Pasar baru serta Gereja Katedral dan Masjid Istiqlal. Lokasinya benar - benar strategis untuk menginap di area Jakarta Pusat.

Harga & Fasilitas Hotel

Sebagai budget hotel, harga yang ditawarkan Pop Hotel  benar-benar affordable sekali dengan fasilitas yang baik. Wifinya kencang, shower berfungsi dengan baik. Room bersih dan setiap hari linen diganti sama mas Aji selaku room boy. Untuk di loby ada pitstop juga yg disediakan pop hotel untuk menu2 yang disajikan sangat variasi dari makanan dan minuman.

Catatan Tambahan :

Berhubung Pop Hotel ini hotel low budget, jadi mereka tidak menyediakan sandal hotel dan amenities lengkap. Untuk amenities  dan sandal bisa dibeli di meja receptionist. 

Terima kasih Pop Hotel kapan saya akan menginap lagi pokoknya recommend lah untuk hotel budget.
title: Pengalaman menginap selama di pop hotel pasar baru

text:
Hotel ini cukup baik dengan lokasi yang ada di area Pasar Baru sehingga mencari makan ataupun berbelanja terasa cukup mudah. Ada banyak makanan tersedia di seberang jalan, khususnya di siang hari.

Di malam hari, ada beberapa pedagang kaki lima yang menjual makanan di sekitar hotel dengan harga yang terjangkau.

Luas kamar memang tidak terlalu besar namun cukup jika menginap tanpa membawa anak atau keluarga.

Hanya saja, di dalam kamar tidak disediakan sikat gigi dan odol sehingga tamu harus membawa sendiri atau membeli.

Akses wifi cukup cepat sehingga memudahkan bagi tamu yang dalam kondisi bekerja dan memerlukan signal wifi yang cukup cepat.
title: Mudah Mencari Makanan Di Seputar Hotel

text: Pop Hotel Pasar Baru lokasi mudah ditemukan karena ada di pinggir jalan raya, berjejer dengan hotel-hotel budget lainnya dan pas di seberang pintu gerbang Passer Baroe (bagian belakang). Desain hotel minimalis. Tiap kamar dilengkapi dengan jendela kecil yang menghadap ke jalan raya. Terdapat pula 2 botol air mineral ukuran kecil, handuk, sabun mandi batang dan 1 sachet sampo. Sarapan gratis tidak tersedia, namun di lantai bawah ada pitstop, sebutan tempat untuk membeli makanan yang bisa sedikit mengganjal perut dengan harga terjangkau. Wifi kamar cukup kencang,  di lantai bawah pun tersedia Internet Corner yang bisa diakses tamu hotel secara gratis. Overall, lokasi,  tempat maupun suasana tergolong lumayan untuk ukuran hotel budget di Jakarta.
title: Hotel budget terjangkau, lokasi pas di depan pintu gerbang Passer Baroe bagian belakang

text: Awalnya saya nggak terlalu suka sama Pop Hotel karena konsep kamarnya yang warna-warni. Tapi, Pop Hotel yang di Pasar Baru beda! Saya suka banget sama konsep barunya yang minimalis, modern, dan lebih simpel. Jadi desainnya nggak norak. Tempatnya juga strategis banget, persis di seberang pintu masuk pasar baru. Resepsionisnya melayani 24 jam dan ramah. Sayangnya, karena konsep baru, Pop Hotel Pasar Baru ini nggak menyediakan sarapan (dijual terpisah di Pitstop). Kamarnya nyaman banget, dan satu lagi yang saya suka, sofa nya besar dan di dekat jendela. Kamar mandinya juga modern dan bukan model kabin kayak Pop Hotel lainnya. Lebih nyaman banget. Toiletriesnya sih tetap cuma menyediakan sabun sachet dan 1 sabun batang. Lokasinya sih persis di pinggir jalan raya, tapi nggak berisik jadi tenang buat istirahat. Gampang banget diakses, tinggal jalan kaki dari stasiun Sawah Besar (kurang lebih 1 km). Pokoknya top banget deh! Saya pasti datang lagi, yang penting harganya jangan naik ya, tetap kisaran 250 ribuan!
title: Hotel Budget Luar Biasa di Tengah Kota!

text: I have been there on 1st week of July 2016. From facade, the building architecture is very mature and modern than other POP! Hotels. At lobby, very artistic as my images. They have rear terrace, open air. They also have Pitstop (mini market), internet corner and nice lounge for hangout. At the room, the size of daybed little big near window but window cannot open (unlucky for smokers). Rate start from IDR 298,000 nett/RN without breakfast. Thats way they have Pitstop. The location in front of Gereja Ayam Pasar Baru, near Pasar Baru Gas Station, mini market and only need 30 minutes to Taman Impian Jaya Ancol (themepark). Overall, I will be back again and enjoy my stay at there.
title: New Concept of POP! Hotel

text:
Some of the pros include a very friendly & helpful female receptionist, trustworthy staff, clean room, warm shower, good price, quiet area, strategic location, & comfy bed.

Some of the cons include very bad WiFi usually between 22:00 and 07:00, no door sign (“please do not disturb” or “please clean the room”), no hairdryer, no mini fridge, & several spam messages after the stay begging me to join their membership.

They gave me a room with a very ugly view during my 1-week stay the first time, but then gave me one with a very beautiful view during another stay. During my first stay, the cleaning service didn’t automatically clean the room every day (a few times I had to request it first) and the bed was covered with non-hypoallergenic sheets. During another stay, all of their cleaning service staff didn't wear a face mask.
title: A very decent place to stay

owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Fendyd,

First of all, I would say thank you for spending your time gave us a review and also for choosing POP! Hotel Pasar Baru Jakarta as your accommodation place.

It's happy to read that you like our hotel location but despite that still on behalf of my team I would like to ask apology for your inconvenience during your stay with us related to no dental kit at your room and limited choice of our breakfast. 

Your review will be highlighted to our Management but temporary for our standard in POP! room were only prepare for soap and shampoo. We do provided separately for dental kit with an additional charge, Our breakfast has only limited choices and not have breads also happen because our vendor temporary aren't able to send it regularly since this Pandemic to us but still is our duty to inform you before your check-in for this kind of information. Once again on behalf of my team, we do apology for this. I had informed to all of my team related to this matter and we do hope this miscommunication will not happen anymore..

Please kindly accept our apology and we do hope that you will come again to POP! Hotel Pasar Baru and stay again with us.

Best regards,

Boyke Sanjaya
Hotel Manager

text: Nice budget hotel in perfect location, easy to go anywhere in Jakarta, warm welcoming by the reception, Ms. Suli/Sali (sorry if I'm mistaken), she is very friendly, attentive with my needs, and thanks to her that I can check in earlier, she give me the highest floor which is perfect based on my preference.One thing that need to be improved is the cleanliness, there is spot and ink mark in the pillow (really visible), yellow color in bathroom edge, spot in the sofa but the rest is OK.During check out time, maybe because the staff is limited, they are quite busy with guest check out and with some guest who buy things in their pit stop so it takes little bit longer.The security need more active with guest who bring luggage, although the luggage is small, it will great if they can show the proactive gesture by offering help even though guest doesn't needs.

From all, I suggest don’t booked the room with breakfast, the don’t have variety of breakfast (at that time only have a fried noodles or fried rice) and the quality if food not really good. They also didn’t serve coffee for breakfast (u must pay additional charge) but u can get tea, lol. But i think beside the breakfast all is great.

The front desk staff were nice. They have a selection of drinks/snacks for reasonable prices. Jakarta is not a big tourist town, so not much to do. There is no strong public transportation, so be prepared to take taxis. Make sure to barter the price and have it written down or have the meter turned on.

text: I was making the booking on August for December through Booking.com. I was arrived at around 12:30 for check in and was told that the room is not ready yet. They said the room will be ready at 14:00. I left my luggage in Pop Hotel while waiting for the room to be ready. When i am back from outside to check in at around 15:30, they ask my Boyfriend to speak privately, i was curious what happen. They said to us that Booking.com made mistakes for the bookings, they are fully book and we should move to another property. I was shocked as when we were there at 12:30, the front desk staff did not mention it at all. Whoever mistakes is, what we care is we were tired and need to short it out ASAP. We are disappointed of the way their service recovery. After they said we have to move to another property, we finally agreed to move as we have no other choice. They ask us to WAIT for other people to escort us together to that other property, they were not providing us private car to escort us after what happened. I was saying i am tired and need to get to the hotel soon. But this was what we got. On the way to the other property, i feel something wrong because we moving to somewhere quiet far from POP Hotel. We thought we will move to nearest property but it's actually not! They did not mention that we will moved to other property which is not in Pasar Baru area and they did not mentioned it before. We were choosing POP Hotel Pasar Baru because there will be an event in JIEXPO and so we would like to have nearest property from there (easy transportation) and also POP Hotel is a new Property. This is totally unprofessional way to solve their mistake. I was really mad and i called their manager, Mr Taufik to speak. He was saying the most unbelievable things to their customer "if you talk about loss, we also loss in every way because we need to move you with higher rate". I am hospitality person, so i know exactly how it is but they were not giving us better accommodation hence i am not buy it. That is totally not the kind of sentence you deliver to your disappointed guest. We were receive a total unprofessional act from POP Hotel Pasar Baru and notes for Booking.com as well so then you know what happened on site. As i mentioned above, whoever mistake was it, guest will not buy it. The thing is how you handle the mistake properly to calm down the guests. Hoping that other travelers will not facing the same problem with us with this Hotel.
title: Unprofessional Hotel

text: De kamers van dit hotel zijn erg fijn en efficient ingedeeld. Er is ruimte, een bureautje en de rand boven het bed is een goede en efficiënte vervanging van het nachtkastje (beter zelfs!). text:
Pop! Hotel heeft aan alle verwachtingen voldaan! Mooi hotel, keurig gestyled, netjes en zeer vriendelijk personeel. En vooral heel erg schoon!

Entree/lobby/restaurant ziet er netjes en strak uit. Eten en drinken tegen betaling beschikbaar. Gratis wifi door het hele hotel en evt een internet hoek. Snel werkende liften.

Kamer: Niet heel groot, maar prima voor een paar nachten! Eigen badkamer met toilet, tv, zitbank/3e bed, airco. 

Tip: Neem oordoppen mee vanwege het ochtendgebed! (Hoorbaar door heel Jakarta).

Tja wat moet je zeggen over de omgeving en Jakarta zelf, je moet er van houden. Hotel bevind zich in een druk centrum gedeelte, en op zo'n 25min lopen van Gambir treinstation.
title: Vet goed!
